resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104497</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104497</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206364</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Civil War Treasures from the New York Historical Society</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bürgerkrieg-Schätze von der New York historischen
Gesellschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trésors de guerre civile de la société 
historique de New York</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tesouros da guerra civil da sociedade histórica de
New York</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tesori di guerra civile dalla società storica de 
New York</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θησαυροί εμφύλιου πολέμου από την ιστορική κοινωνία 
της Νέας Υόρκης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tesoros de la guerra civil de la sociedad 
histórica de Nueva York</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers materials for teaching about the Civil War. It includes recruitment posters, sketches, photos, a prison camp newspaper, and letters Walt Whitman wrote to wounded servicemen. Special sections examine the 1860 election, secession, war, African Americans in the Civil War, and recruitment and conscription.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bietet Materialien für das Unterrichten über den
Bürgerkrieg an. Er enthält Verstärkungplakate, Skizzen, 
Fotos, eine Gefängnislagerzeitung, und Zeichen Walt Whitman schrieben
verletzten Soldaten. Spezielle Kapitel überprüfen die 
Wahl 1860, Sezession, Krieg, afrikanischen Amerikaner im 
Bürgerkrieg und Verstärkung und Einberufung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">offre des matériaux pour enseigner au sujet de la
guerre civile. Elle inclut des affiches de recrutement, croquis,
photos, un journal de camp de prison, et les lettres Walt Whitman ont 
écrit aux soldats blessés. Les sections spéciales examinent 
l'élection 1860, la secession, la guerre, les Américains africains 
dans la guerre civile, et le recrutement et la conscription.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">oferece materiais para ensinar sobre a guerra 
civil. Inclui posteres do recruitment, esboços, fotos, um 
jornal do acampamento da prisão, e as letras Walt Whitman escreveram 
aos recrutas feridos. As seções especiais examinam a eleição
1860, o secession, a guerra, os americanos africanos na guerra civil, 
e o recruitment e o conscription.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">offre i materiali per l'istruzione circa la guerra
civile. Include i manifesti di reclutamento, abbozzi, foto, un 
giornale dell'accampamento della prigione e le lettere Walt Whitman 
hanno scritto ai tecnici di manutenzione ferriti. Le sezioni 
speciali esaminano l'elezione 1860, il secession, la guerra, gli 
Americani africani nella guerra civile ed il reclutamento ed il 
conscription.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υλικά προσφορών για τη διδασκαλία για τον εμφύλιο 
πόλεμο. Περιλαμβάνει τις αφίσες στρατολόγησης, σκίτσα, 
φωτογραφίες, μια εφημερίδα στρατόπεδων φυλακών, και οι επιστολές 
Walt Whitman έγραψαν πληγωμένα servicemen. Τα ειδικά
τμήματα εξετάζουν τη 1860 εκλογή, αποχώρηση, πόλεμος, 
αφρικανικοί Αμερικανοί στον εμφύλιο πόλεμο, και τη στρατολόγηση 
και τη στρατολογία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ofrece los materiales para enseñar sobre la 
guerra civil. Incluye los carteles del reclutamiento, bosquejos,
fotos, un periódico del campo de la prisión, y las cartas Walt 
Whitman escribieron a los mecánicos heridos. Las secciones 
especiales examinan la elección 1860, la secesión, la guerra, los 
americanos africanos en la guerra civil, y el reclutamiento y el 
reclutamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206364</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104497</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/civil-war-treasures-from-the-new-york-historical-society</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
